ROOT:
-- DaoT_WorkflowHistory_S2_Select -- 2014/7/4 日立 太郎 SELECT [WorkflowControlNo], [HistoryNo], [WfPositionId], [FromUserId], [FromUserInfo], [ActionType], [ToUserId], [ToUserInfo], [NextWfPositionId], [ReserveArea], [ReplyDeadline], [StartDate], [AcceptanceDate], [EndDate] FROM [T_WorkflowHistory]
WHERE [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNo
